src:
Jadwal Pertandingan Shopee Liga 1 Hari Ini, Minggu 3 November 2019
03 Nov 2019, 10:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Shopee Liga 1 2019 pekan ke-26 menginjak hari kedua. Dua pertandingan panas bakal jadi sajian utama hari ini, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Dua pertandingan itu adalah Persija Jakarta menjamu tim tetangga, Tira Persikabo, dan Madura United yang meladeni tantangan tim yang sedang naik daun, Persipura Jayapura.
Mana yang paling Anda nantikan? Apa pun pilihan Anda, dua pertandingan seru itu akan disiarkan secara langsung di Indosiar juga melalui live streaming di Vidio.
Duel Persija versus Tira Persikabo diprediksi seru, kendati kedua tim terpisah jarak di klasemen sementara Liga 1 2019. Persija ada di peringkat ke-15 sedangkan Tira Persikabo ada di urutan ketujuh. Selisih kedua tim, 13 poin.
Buat kedua tim, kemenangan penting artinya. Buat Persija, bisa menjadikan mereka menjauhi area rawan degradasi sementara Tira Persikabo, menyudahi sembilan pertandingan tanpa kemenangan.
Di Bangkalan, Madura United mencoba memperpanjang catatan tak terkalahkan di kandang sendiri dalam tujuh laga terakhir. Namun, tim yang akan datang mengunjungi markas mereka, bukan tim sembarangan.
Persipura belum terkalahkan dalam lima pertandingan terakhir, termasuk dua partai tandang masing-masing melawan Semen Padang dan Badak Lampung FC.
Catatan apik yang dimiliki kedua tim jadi modal bentrokan, yang akan membuat jalannya pertandingan sayang untuk dilewatkan.

Simak jadwal pertandingan pekan ke-26 Liga 1 2019, Minggu (3/11/2019), selengkapnya:
text:
Shopee League 1 Match Schedule Today, Sunday 3 November 2019
Nov 3 2019, 10:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Shopee Liga 1 2019 Week 26 step on the second day. Two hot matches will be the main dish today, Sunday (3/11/2019).
The two matches were Jakarta Persija entertaining the neighboring team, Tira Persikabo, and Madura United who served the challenges of the rising team, Jayapura Persipura.
Which are you waiting for the most? Whatever your choice, these two exciting matches will be broadcast live on Indosiar as well as live streaming on Video.
The duel of Persija versus Tira Persikabo is predicted to be exciting, even though the two teams are separated by distance in the 2019 League 1 standings. Persija is ranked 15th while Tira Persikabo is seventh. Difference between the two teams, 13 points.
For both teams, victory is important. Create Persija, can make them stay away from relegation-prone areas while Tira Persikabo, finished nine games without a win.
In Bangkalan, Madura United tried to extend their unbeaten home record in the last seven matches. However, the team that will come to visit their headquarters, not the team carelessly.
Roma are unbeaten in the last five matches, including two away parties each against Semen Padang and Badak Lampung FC.
The neat notes of the two teams have become a clash capital, which will make the game a pity to miss.
